titleStmt.title: Sylvia's revenge, or, A satyr against man in answer to the Satyr against woman.
titleStmt.author: Ames, Richard, d. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Joseph Streater ... and are to be sold by John Southby ... and most other booksellers ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Ames. Cf. BM; Cambridge bib. of English lit.
In answer to Robert Gould's Love given o're, or, A satyr against ... woman.
